name: blow-http-statuses

scripts.pretest: npm run build && tsc test/*.ts --module commonjs --target ES6 --experimentalDecorators --emitDecoratorMetadata
scripts.coverage: npm run pretest && ./node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover _mocha --harmony_default_parameters --harmony_destructuring && npm run posttest

readme:
# blow-http-statuses

#### Access to codes via literals.  

```typescript
import {Codes} from 'blow-http-statuses';

console.log(Codes.OK); // 200
console.log(Codes.BadGateway); // 502
```

#### Access to messages via codes.

```typescript
import {Messages} from 'blow-http-statuses';

console.log(Messages[200]); // OK
console.log(Messages[502]); // Bad Gateway
```

#### Get status as JSON object

```typescript
import {status} from 'blow-http-statuses';

console.log(status('OK')); // { code: 200, message: 'OK' }
console.log(status(502); // { code: 502, message: 'Bad Gateway' }
```

#### Helper methods which allow to check type of status.

```typescript
import {isEmpty, isRedirect, isRetry} from 'blow-http-statuses';

console.log(isEmpty(Codes.NoContent)); // true
console.log(isRedirect(Codes.MultipleChoices)); // true
console.log(isRetry(Codes.BadGateway)); // true
```
